XMVKQQ-1.name: Andrew Kim

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Computer Science & Information Technology
education.honors: Summa Cum Laude and Honors Scholar

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and deployed full-stack features; resolved critical compliance incidents; eliminated container downtime; won 1st place among new hires for a full-stack application.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Implemented cost-saving optimizations; mitigated security vulnerabilities; modernized continuous deployment pipelines.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Redesigned UI and features; reduced loading time for RV cameras; collaborated in an Agile environment.

experience.title: CSSI Scholar
experience.description: Completed a 4-week intensive computer science program; configured coding projects in JavaScript.

XMVKQQ-1.quick summary: Highly accomplished and award-winning computer science graduate with extensive experience in software engineering, particularly at JPMorgan Chase & Co.  Demonstrates strong skills in full-stack development, DevOps, cloud technologies (AWS), and security.  Consistent record of exceeding expectations and achieving top performance in both individual and team projects.
XMVKQQ-1.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Andrew,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Professional position at [Company Name] and for taking the time to submit your application. We were very impressed with your qualifications and accomplishments, particularly your experience at JPMorgan Chase & Co. and your impressive academic record. Your demonstrated skills in full-stack development, DevOps, and cloud technologies align well with the requirements of this role.  We would like to invite you to an interview to discuss your application further.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]

XMVKQQ-2.name: Tanay Parikh

experience.title: Software Testing/Marketing
experience.description: Testing Beta Software on different operating systems and devices, and reporting bugs to the developers to reduce bugs in the public release. Developing various strategies to make the application prominent in the community and increase the total number of downloads.

experience.title: Front-End Engineer/Project Team Lead
experience.description: Led a team of four software engineers to design and develop an Android app. Developed an easy to use interactive front-end using Android Studio and implemented functionality like user sign up and user login authentication using JSON. Utilized CI/CD to automate tests and integrate the code. Organized meeting to ensure keeping up with promised deadlines and verify any deviations in the project. Met deadlines and presented the application progress on a monthly basis to extrapolate the progress made in the project.

experience.title: UI/UX Engineer
experience.description: Developed an IOS, Android and Web application card game with a team of six software engineers using Native React. Designed a theme for the app which was used throughout app. Designed and developed a “Rules Page” and added a button functionality which let the user either start the game from the rules page or take the user back to the “Home Page” with haptic feedback at any moment either button was pressed. The team worked in an Agile environmental and Utilized Azure DevOps to integrate software.

experience.title: Embedded C Programming
experience.description: Developed code for a robot and designed it to autonomously find it’s destination address which was identified by four specifically sized poles. The code designed to avoid obstacles like cliffs, walls and different types of poles. Configured registers and GPIO ports so the sensors like the Clift, Ultrasound and infrared sensor would relay back the correct sensor values. Developed a piece of software where the program could return the width of the pole in centimeters from taking in the reading from the ultrasound sensor.

XMVKQQ-2.quick summary: Tanay Parikh is a software engineering student at Iowa State University with experience in software testing, marketing, front-end and UI/UX engineering, and embedded systems programming.  He has led teams on multiple projects, utilizing Agile methodologies and CI/CD. His skills include Java, C, JavaScript, React, Android Studio, and various other tools and technologies.
XMVKQQ-2.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Tanay,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Professional position at [Company Name]. While your resume demonstrates a strong background in software development and project management, your experience doesn't directly align with the specific cybersecurity requirements of this role. We appreciate you taking the time to apply and wish you the best in your job search.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]

WJBISQ-1.name: MUHAMMAD AZIM FAIZAL

education.project: Cloud-Based Helpdesk Ticketing System Using Python & Flask

experience.title: IT Support Executive
experience.description: Provided Tier 1 and Tier 2 support to over 200 employees across 3 branch offices. Installed, configured, and maintained hardware, software, and printers. Managed user accounts and group policies through Active Directory. Assisted in migrating company email system to Microsoft 365 with zero downtime. Documented IT processes and created internal knowledge base articles.

experience.title: System Administrator Intern
experience.description: Monitored server uptime and assisted in daily backups and patch management. Supported the setup of virtual machines using VMware and Hyper-V. Helped resolve networking issues and upgraded antivirus systems across campus labs.

WJBISQ-1.quick summary: A recent IT graduate with 3+ years of experience in IT support and system administration.  Proficient in various operating systems, networking protocols, programming languages, and IT tools.  Experience includes managing user accounts, migrating email systems, and troubleshooting network issues. Holds CompTIA A+ and ITIL Foundation certifications.
WJBISQ-1.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Muhammad Azim Faizal,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Professional position at [Company Name]. We appreciate you taking the time to submit your application.

Your resume demonstrates a strong foundation in IT support and system administration, and your skills and experience align well with many aspects of the role.  Your projects and certifications further showcase your technical abilities. 

While your background is impressive, we have decided to move forward with candidates whose experience more closely aligns with the specific cybersecurity requirements of this particular position.  We wish you the best in your job search.

Sincerely,
The [Company Name] Hiring Team
